artist: Engraver: Thomas Goff Lupton; Painter: After Aelbert Cuyp
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on plate below image in black: [ Painted by Cuyp   Engraved by on Steel by T. Lupton/ THE TRAVELLER/ From a picture in the possession of the Right Hon'able the Earl of Carlisle, K.G. &c &c/ THE GEMS OF ART PLATE 2]; on sheet in pencil: [1-328]
title: The Traveller
